channel.title: [317]KingsOfScape
channel.description:
[IMG]http://kingsofgamers.com/images/LF/logo.png[/img] KingsOfScape Server Features:
[B]- Has beast combat! - 317 server with 633 character models and 602 cache. - Server is based to Pking and skilling. - Specials work 100% - Dragon claws works 100% - Dragonfire shield works 100% with charging! - 100% Working pvp armours and items ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! - Corporal beast lair - Edge is home - Working spell timers / spells! - Tormented demon! - Thieving from stall for money if needed - Working special / health bar - Banking works. - Skillcape emotes. - ::Pure on begin! - Nice Dfs handler - Awesome donator benefits! - The Donator chest - Much More Added :) - Donator zone have been redone - Much more[/B]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1317093/vengeance.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1317059/claws.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1317099/workingdfs.gif[/img]
[B]Much more looking for staff mods / developers and forum moderators :)[/B]
[B]Play Now!: KingsOfScape[/B]
Forums: [url=http://www.kingsofgamers.com]www.kingsofgamers.com[/url]
Web Client: [URL=http://"http://kingsofgamers.com/runescape/index.php"]http://kingsofgamers.com/runescape/index.php[/URL]
Join us today we looking for dedicated staff :)

item.title: [317]KingsOfScape

item.description:
@KingsOfGamers wrote:


KingsOfScape Server Features:

[B]- Has beast combat!

  • 317 server with 633 character models and 602 cache.
  • Server is based to Pking and skilling.
  • Specials work 100%
  • Dragon claws works 100%
  • Dragonfire shield works 100% with charging!
  • 100% Working pvp armours and items ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
  • Corporal beast lair
  • Edge is home
  • Working spell timers / spells!
  • Tormented demon!
  • Thieving from stall for money if needed
  • Working special / health bar
  • Banking works.
  • Skillcape emotes.
  • ::Pure on begin!
  • Nice Dfs handler
  • Awesome donator benefits!

  • Much More Added
